CustomField.description: This field is use to display the Funding Expiry/ Extension End date for EDRD Cases.
CustomField.formula: IF( AND( Case__r.RecordType.DeveloperName = "EDRD", ISPICKVAL(Case__r.EDRD_MOHFunding_Decision__c, "Approved") ), Case__r.EDRD_MOHFunding_Expiry_Date__c, IF( AND( Case__r.RecordType.DeveloperName = "EDRD", ISPICKVAL(Case__r.EDRD_MOHFunding_Decision__c, "Extended") ), Case__r.EDRD_MOHFunding_Extension_Date__c, NULL ) )
CustomField.label: Funding Expiry Date
